synopsis.text:
How about this for a new synopsis:

In a world where select individuals can materialize weapons from their souls, known as Blazers, Tooru Kokonoe is an anomaly. Instead of a weapon, his soul manifests as a shield, making him an "Irregular" among his peers. Driven by a desire for vengeance after the loss of his loved ones, Tooru enrolls at Kouryou Academy, a prestigious school for Blazers. There, students form partnerships to enhance their abilities and strive to achieve the ultimate power of Absolute Duo. However, Tooru's unique ability draws the attention of a foreign student named Julie Sigtuna, and together they must navigate the challenges of the academy and the bonds of partnership. Will Tooru's shield be enough to exact his revenge and protect those he cares about? Only time will tell in this thrilling school battle action anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
